Package modelo.projects

Class Social

java.lang.Object
modelo.projects.Project
modelo.projects.Social
All Implemented Interfaces:
es.uam.eps.sadp.grants.GrantRequest, java.io.Serializable
public class Social
extends Project
This class represents the projects of social type. This kind of projects will affect one specific group of the society.
Author:
Cesar Ramirez
